!An occupational change means someone with certain abilities and experience gets promoted to a higher-level occupation. The Assassin may change occupations to a *Abyss Walker* or a *Phantom Ranger*. Which occupation do you want to learn about? [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30474/13.htm|Abyss Walker] [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30474/16.htm|Phantom Ranger]Â
